name: 最终幸存者Ultimate Survivor
description:
Ultimate Survivor is an exploration shooting game. You are the only player in the game. At the beginning of the game, the player was born in an area called the land of the polar day, which is very barren. The game will provide the players with survival necessities, and there will be a non-toxic area randomly in the area, which can improve your detection discipline and energy recovery speed. In this place, players will improve themselves in exploration and hunting Please do not let your radiation value close to 100 in the game. If the radiation value reaches 100, your health value will be reduced until you die. Maybe we can find some clues in the game to understand the world of the game,The upgrade of the level will also reduce the consumption of the role of the game. The recycling system in the game can exchange gold coins. Gold coins can be purchased in the mall for props and clothes, Please don't challenge detector with crossbow in the game. The detector deals high damage to players.
Ultimate survivor is the foreword of the whole game. Player information in foreword of the game will become the only ticket in the subsequent expansion of boundary portal. (pending plan)
(Ultimate Survivor) the game is independently developed by one person, and the content of the game will be constantly updated in the later stage.
